sn45.21:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong way and the right way.
sn45.21:1.4: And what is the wrong way?
sn45.21:1.5: It is wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.21:1.6: This is called the wrong way.
sn45.21:1.7: And what is the right way?
sn45.21:1.8: It is right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.21:1.9: This is called the right way.”
